Reviews.Title: Worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: furtrapperpete
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to use at Discovery Cove in Orlando, but have used it so many more places.  It was great to use at the water park and theme parks.  I didn't need to take my high end camera with us.  The camera is durable and takes really good pics. I read a previous review that said they kept getting water in it.  You do have to make sure the latch is all the way closed and it sometimes takes some doing but we had absolutely no problem with water getting inside.  We played with the cameras settings in our backyard pool before we went on vacation so we would have quality pics.If you are thinking of purchasing a waterproof camera this is the one to buy, affordable and great pics!
